text: Deyakyy z nykh slukhayete vas, ale my rozmishchuyemo vualʹ na yikhnikh serdenʹkakh zavazhyty yim z rozuminnya, ta deafness u yikhnikh vushrakh. Otzhe, niyaka materiya yakyy riznovyd dokazu vony ne dyvlyatʹsya, vony ne mozhutʹ poviryty. Otzhe, koly vony prybuvayutʹ sperechatysya z vamy, disbelievers kazhutʹ, "Tse - povisti z mynuli
